  • Constructor Details

    • Blackjack

      public Blackjack()
      Initializes most basic version of Blackjack with all default parameters.

    • Blackjack

      public Blackjack(int reshuffleCutOff)
      Initializes basic version of Blackjack with n players.
      Parameters:
      reshuffleCutOff - the amount of cards in the deck before which the game will reshuffle.

    • Blackjack

      public Blackjack(int reshuffleCut, int players, int decks, boolean highLow, boolean interactive, boolean npcAI, boolean advancedAI, boolean debugger)
      Initializes advanced version of Blackjack with n players, m decks, and with optional highLow settings.
      Parameters:
      reshuffleCut - the amount of cards in the deck before which the game will reshuffle.
      players - the amount of players.
      decks - the amount of decks to play with.
      highLow - optional high-low ace setting.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Should reset the game. Both the player Hand and dealer Hand should start with no cards. If the number of cards in the deck is less than the reshuffle cutoff, then the method should create a fresh (complete), shuffled deck. Otherwise, it should not modify the deck, just clear the player and dealer hands.

    • deal

      public void deal()
      Should deal out two cards to both players from the Deck.

    • playerTurn

      public boolean playerTurn()
      Have the player draw cards until the total value of the player's hand is equal to or above 16.
      Returns:
      false if the player goes over 21, (bust)

    • playerTurn

      public boolean playerTurn(Hand player)
      have the player draw cards until the total value of the player's hand is equal to or above 16.
      Parameters:
      player - which player to deal to.
      Returns:
      false if the player goes over 21, (bust)

    • dealerTurn

      public boolean dealerTurn()
      Have the dealer draw cards until the total of the dealer's hand is equal to or above 17.
      Returns:
      false if the dealer goes over 21.

    • setReshuffleCutoff

      public void setReshuffleCutoff(int cutoff)
      Should assign the new cutoff value to the internal reshuffle cutoff field.
      Parameters:
      cutoff - the number of cards at which to reshuffle;

    • getReshuffleCutoff

      public int getReshuffleCutoff()
      returns the current value of the reshuffle cutoff field.
      Returns:
      the reshuffleCutOff, the number of cards in the deck before the deck reshuffles on next Game.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Shows the player and dealer hands as well as their current total value.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      returns a String that has represents the state of the game.
